body.name: Office Chair Desk Chairs with Wheels, Ergonomic Office Chair with Lumbar Support and Flip-up Arms, Mesh Computer Chair Height Adjustable, Tilt and Lock Function, Grey
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 50 mins
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 17 hrs 20 mins
features: 🥇ERGONOMIC OFFICE CHAIR: Ergonomic backrest perfectly fits the curve of your back, reducing your back pressure and pain. High-quality wear-resistant mesh fabric keeps air circulation to avoid sweating and sticking. The widened seat is filled with high-density rebound foam, which will not sink with long-term use. The waterfall edge design will relax your thighs greatly!

🥇MULTI-FUNCTION DESIGNS: The 90 -120-DEGREE ROCKING design meets your different sitting positions, and ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT design to meet the sitting needs of people of different heights. 360-DEGREE ROTATION design allows you to adjust your position anytime and anywhere. The mesh office chair to make your work and play more comfortable.

🥇PADDED FLIP-UP ARMRESTS: The office chair flip up arms are covered with wider, breathable padding to provide the ultimate forearm and elbow comfort. Pulling up the armrests makes it easier to push the home office desk chairs fully under the table to maximize space. Suitable for office, living room, study room, meeting room, etc.

🥇PREMIUM MATERIALS: The home office chair has a reliable HEIGHT-ADJUSTABLE gas lift and a 5-star METAL BASE that can withstand up to 250 pounds. Its 360° ROTATING CASTERS run smoothly and won't damage floors or carpets, making it suitable for most office floors.

🥇EASY TO SET UP: Computer desk chair comes with all hardware & necessary tools. Follow the chair instructions and you can assemble it in just fifteen minutes and then enjoy and admire it! You will feel ultimate comfort in this ergonomic desk chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up. Comfortable. Great value.
reviews.reviewText: Took me like 20 - 30 mins to build. Bottom cushion is thick, soft. Unlike my previous chair (which had a flat back), the backseat literally makes you sit straight because of the curves so that's a plus. Chair looks nice and for the value, better than most other chairs in this price range.Instructions were pretty clear, very easy. One problem was that one of the screws didn't screw in all the way in the bottom but the part was secure in its location, holding tightly. Not really bothered about it.Remember to keep the screw tool. Never know when you might need to tighten the bolts. The tool even fits on the screws to my other chair. So it's pretty handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Took some time to build - but well worth it because it came out super strong
reviews.reviewText: This is not a flimsy char even though I got it real cheap (one of the colors was discounted but it came out beautiful). I got 2 of these for my home office and they were required some effort to put together because of the large bolts and because i wanted everything to be super strong for years to come. They run smoothly on the floor. Folding side handles is an advantage, too. All tools and bolts were good. The back is ergonomic, airy and comfortable at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It feels a little cheap - it is, after all, for an ergonomic chair - but I love that I can move the armrests out of the way, and the ergonomic back curve is very supportive. Overall a good chair for working from home. Instructions say to fix the armrests to the base first and then fix them to the back. Do it the other way around or the back won't properly align with the armrests, and you will really struggle! Other than that, easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice for the price. Way lighter than my old chair so its easier to roll around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to assemble and still not "right"
reviews.reviewText: Don't ignore the tips on these ratings about how to put this thing together, rather than in the order of the instructions. I did, and it took me almost 2 hours to take apart and reassemble. AND it's still not right (one side's drilled holes don't line up, resulting in my purchased chair being kind if wobbly, NOT something that makes it feel safe). I bought this over a year ago, and got lazy, relying on the old broken down one I have had for years, and that chair still feels safer than this one. Tilt function also isn't working. Guess I'll have to disassemble a second time to see if that can be corrected. Obviously, I would not purchase again. Cannot recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the fold up arms
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty comfy desk chair, I love that the arms fold up for convenience. DON'T even consider the cheaper version of this chair that is very similar- I almost did that and also glad I went with this one. The wheels roll easily on the floor, the cushion is comfortable for a few hours of sitting, and the mesh back is nice to keep my back supported and cool. The arms do fold up straight and the dont go all the way behind the back of the chair but it's not really hindered my comfort while using the chair. I had no trouble following the easy to read directions, everything came in the packaging and I had it put together in about 15 minutes. I am very pleased with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very Uncomfortable - Back and tail bone pain
reviews.reviewText: I really want to like this chair. However, after using this chair for the last two weeks my back and tail bone have consistently been extremely sore. The construction and sturdiness of the chair is great and it’s easy to assemble. Unfortunately, it falls short in the most important area, which it providing support and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved this new office chair. Great for my home office since I’m having to take work home … ALOT! Love how the arm rest is able to lift up with chair needs to go under my desk.
